column2: With the help of the new worksheets, it will be easier for you to calculate sample statistics.
Using the same methodology as in the lecture, find if there is pay gap based on Gender.

Null hypothesis- mean of male salary=mean of female salary
Applied 2-sample t-test here.
Take some sample values from the data.
alpha is taken as 0.05
output values:
t=1.15
degree of freedom=28
critical value=1.7
p-value=0.25
t<=critical value and also p>alpha, thus it implies we will accept our null hypotheis.
